articles.title: Christopher Hitchens, from dove to hawk | TLS
articles.description: Christopher Hitchens, from dove to hawk GEOFFREY WHEATCROFT Christopher Hitchens AND YET . . . 352pp. Atlantic. £20. 978 1 782 39457 0 US: Simon and Schuster.…
articles.notes: Hitchens was a better stylist and performer than thinker. That's a sentiment I agree with.
